Executive: Ha sollunga sollunga
Customer: Ha ma'am sollunga ma'am sollunga ma'am.

Customer: Okay Sri Sathya Jyothi
Executive: Aama aama aama ma'am aama ma'am sollunga ma'am.
Customer: Nanga close pannalamnu irukkom ethuvum benefit ethuvum irukka maari theriyala.
Executive: Yen enna achu ma'am?
Customer: Illa orders ethuvum illa just enquiries mattum thaan varuthu athuvum
Executive: Information seekers thaan irukku illingala?
Customer: Aama aama.
Executive: Okay ma'am ithula enna na namma eduthirukrathu package vanthu oru basic service la namma use panrom illingala ma'am.
Customer: Package irunthalum neenga enna konjam enakkum convince pannanum cancel panni koduthurunga.
Executive: Orey nimisham ma'am orey nimisham ma'am.
Executive: Sir namma intha Sri Sakthi issue irukanga.

Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Executive: A sollunga ma'am.
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ma'am sollunga kekuthu.
Customer: Intha subscription konjam cancel pannittinga na it could be good because we don't we are just getting the enquiry athunala ethuvum business develop pannala ethuvum illa.
Executive: Okay enna maari response irukku enna problem irukku ma'am ithula actually?
Customer: Response just phone calls varuthu just enquiry panranga avlothaan.
Customer: Athukapuram ellam athuvum varathu ellamum vara totally antha north north india antha maari irukku like ethuvum benefit ethuvum irukka maari theriyala ithula.
Executive: Okay okay illa just like that nu kettutu move on aaidraanga appdingreengala?
Customer: Aama like okay okay actually neenga panrathu vanthu intha cattle feeds ithu related aa panreenga correct ma'am.
Customer: Aama cattle cattle feeds ithu ellam panreenga actually neenga pannittu irukkakoodiya intha ithula vanthu paatheenga appdina india martla neraiya sellers iruppaanga okingala ippo naan ithu ethukku solren appdina neenga ippo vanthu refund kekreenga appdina like ithu ithula ithula valida illa ithula enquiries illa appdina definitely we will consider this to proceed the refund ma'am but here we are having a good number of opportunity to close the business enna na neenga ippo potrukra intha paddy sheets aagattum cattle feed aagattum millet health mix aagattum intha moonu category kume kadasi three athavathu 12 months la almost 63395 by leads mattum post aayirukku.
Executive: Athavathu 63000 enquiry 63000 enquiry post aayirukku appdina konjam yosichu paarunga so ithu enna ithukku vanthuttu validaana oru industry la neenga irukkeenga nu solli so athunala ennodaiya suggestion enna appdina neenga ippo enter aayirukkeenga ngm bothu it is of course online ngm bothu sila information seekers adhikaama varathaan seivaanga so ithu information seekers nu mattum illaama namakku future buyers me varuvaanga at the same time instant buyers me irukka seivaanga so intha information seekers comparatively konjam adhikaama irukrathunala ungalukku intha business conversion neenga paathurukka maateenga so yen appdina inga india martla by lead post aagura by lead vanthu paatheenga appdina ethunala by leads aa varaanga ippo oru example ku solren naan oru buyer aa irukka appdina naan india martla by lead post panrathukkaana reason enna vaa irukkum appdina so we we i am going to expecting the number of quotations ma'am so ippo neenga ungalukku varakoodiya ithe lead vanthu innooru naal anju sellers ku pogum appo antha naal anju sellers me attend panni pesum bothu neenga eppdi oru quotation share panreengalo ithe maari oru naal anju quotation me share aagum antha idathula so by leads in the sense athu vanthu quotations kaaga vanthu maximum buyers ulla varaanga ippo ungaludaiya quotation vanthu antha idathula okay vaa okay aagala appdina athukku reason enna vaa irukkum appdina maybe ungaludaiya pricing maybe edhaavathu increase aayirukkalaam illa online la varathunala maybe maybe edhaavathu trust factors issues irukkalaam maybe edhaavathu oru problem irukkalaam appo athu enna idam ngm rathu mattum namma find out panni like so thing is like intha business vanthu offline la we are running more than like 35 plus years so ithula potta digitalize pannalaamnu thaan intha try panni we don't think like it's moving forward so athunala thaan we just wanted to cancel yeah if we are like digitalize panni ungalukku venumna we can improve our like own website or something ithu india mart we don't think for us not for all engalukku ithu forward ethuvum aagala yeah ithu nadakkala puriyuthu naan onnu panren ma'am actually unga competitors enna maari strategy use panraanga and ippo maximum india martla vanthu paatheenga na nalla we are getting ethuvum illa invest ithula time invest panrathukkum engalukku mudiyala enna offline customers neraiya irukkaanga naame inga working like owner la thaatha irukkaaru avarume ithula involve aaga mudiyala so konjam antha gapum irukku ithukkulla ithula full time invest panna mudiyala so athunala thaan naan ithula neenga time vanthu romba invest pannumnu avasiyam illing ma'am ithu india martla maximum maximum irukkavum smes thaan iruppaanga so ungalukku theriyumla small medium industries la thaan adhikaama irukkaanga ngm bothu athula maximum small medium industry naale ore oru aal thaan maximum paathuppaanga accounts aagattum illa sales aagattum illa marketing aagattum ellame ore aal paakraanga ngm bothu offline la avanga marketing nerla poi customers paakrathukume undu ippo avangala maari irukkavangalukku ithula time set aagaathu maximum ithula time vanthu oru naalukku one hour la spend panna kooda avasiyam illa to be honest open aa sollana because naan yen ithu solren appdina oru vaarathukku we are giving just 17 leads thaan athavathu 10 weekly leads daily one bonus by leads which means so 17 ethuvum illa ngrathu maari naan solren ya ya i come to the point naan athu solla varen ya ya athu thaan naan solla varen by leads neenga eppdi ithu vanthu neenga konjam like eppdi solrathu innum efficient aavo illa effective aavo eduthuttu polaamgrathukkaana oru sila options naan ungalukku solli tharen actually ippo oru by lead neenga paakureenga appdinnu vachukkongalen athula buyer details requirement details nu solli rendu irukkum athula buyer details maximum neenga vanthu check pannittu neenga irukkum bothu ungalaala better aana oru results paakka mudiyum yen appdina neenga buyer details vanthu ippo join panni one month illa two months la irukkavangala neenga consume panreenga appdina they are might be just information seekers okingala if they are ippo in case oru buyer vanthu since member since oru 10 10 years iruppaanga illa 15 years iruppaanga antha maari buyers ellarume like normal aa entertaining kaaga india martla by leads post panna maattaanga okingala so that naan enna solla varen appdina ungalukku oru vaarathukku 17 lead naanga kodukkrom appdina neenga 17 lead me business expect panna vendaam because here in online la neraiya information seekers irukkaanga ungalukke theriyum yaarum internet use pannala ellarume internet use panrom ellarume vanthu mobile phone handle panrom appdingm bothu of course intha maariyaana information seekers irukkaanga so itha correct aa tackle panrathukkaana oru vishayangal oru sila action points naan venumnaa tharen so action plans namma create pannalaam so namma vanthu google meet la venumnaa connect panni enna enna vishayangal proper aa kondu polaamgrathu vanthu naanum tipson ungaludaiya account manager me join panni so we are ready to give proper explanation so ithu eppdi eduthuttu polaamgrathu and month on month namma connect pannalaam if in case oru oru maathathula edhaavathu problem irukku so business conversion illa enquiries problem enna problem irunthaalum we just sit for the 10 to 15 minutes maximum for the month okingala so we we just create a action plan if in case ungalukku by leads la problem irukku appdina athukkaana action plan create panrathu so everything we will take a review ma'am if in case oru by lead sariyaa pogala appdina athu yen pogala enna problem irukku so we are ready to support you that's why naanga ungalukku oru dedicated account manager vanthu provide pannirukkom okingala but intha decision vanthu avar owner odathu so i am just here to communicate like but here the problem is actually refund option grathu ithula ya ya got it ma'am but refund option grathu illa athunala thaan naan ungalukku intha intha alavukku eduthu solren and also we are having a cattle feed related aa sollirunthaaru yaarunga ma'am sharath return sollunga eppo sonnaarunga ma'am ithu avaru sonnaaru athukapuram thaan intha number la contact panna sonnaaru so i am just contacting okay okay so neenga avara connect panna mudiyuma actually sharath ippovum ithu kadasiya eppo pesuneenga sharath ta sharath avangakitta maybe last week last week avar kooda serthu neenga connect panna mudiyuma i just want to clarify something okay thiruppi intha number la call panna neenga thaan eduppenga naan ennodaiya number tharen ennodaiya number ku call panreengala okay sorry sir intha number ippo enna ithu option illa refund option ithula illiya no ma'am so we are already crossed so it's not possible right now so we are ready to support actually so actually innooru vishayam enna na neenga last ippo join panni six months la i mean three months aayirukku intha three months la vanthu paatheenga appdina ungalukku neenga use panna antha leads base panni ungalukku promotion wise me romba nalla nadanthurukku neenga namba maateenga neenga oru product vanthu potrukkeenga name vanthu paatheenga appdina exact aa solren so leading of just normal cattle feed onnu potrukkeenga 49 kg petal feed appdinnu solli oru sorry pellet feed appdinnu solli onnu potrukkeenga illaiya athai naan vanthu normal aa search panni paarthen in viluppuramnu solli potrukken neenga venumna search panni paarunga in viluppuramnu solli unga product name pottu naan search pannum bothu enakku direct aa ungaludaiya website athavathu india mart udaiya website enakku direct aa google la show aaguthu so ithu ellame oruthangalukku eduthathume nadanthurathu illing ma'am ungalukku vanthu avlo nalla promotion nadanthurukku so intha maari neenga seo pannalume promotion vanthu udane increase aagaathu but here it's happening as a organically so athunala neenga atha vittra vendaamgrathu ennodaiya chinna suggestion and we don't have the option in refund also thank you neenga enna solreenga ellam puriyuthu promotion ellame enakku puriyuthu but business panravangalukku when they get the profit appothaan vanthu oru mind set will be money minded thaan numbers and statistics vachi eppdi pesara mudiyumnu ninaikreenga got it got it ma'am illa illa neenga solrathu correct but we are ready to support you illaiya so neenga atha consider pannunga so i think sharath avanga neenga pesuneenga appdina you just connect with me i just share my number to you so if in case avar marubadiyum antha maari solraaru appdina you just tell me ma'am so we are ready to support you so neenga illana call call kooda edunga enakku onnum prachchanai illa so we just discuss about this okay i will ask sharath then yes yes please please please okay ma'am so
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to cancel the subscription.

- Orders are not generating, only inquiries.

- Inquiries are from North India.

- No business development.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the benefits of the subscription.

- Executive offered to create action plans.

- Executive offered a Google Meet session.

- Executive shared his contact number.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will discuss with Sharath.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, refund, buyleads, business development
